1.name: Tonari no Totoro
1.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

2.name: Willow
2.description: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

3.name: Coming to America
3.description: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.

4.name: Beetlejuice
4.description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

5.name: Die Hard
5.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

6.name: Big
6.description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

7.name: Hotaru no haka
7.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

8.name: Mississippi Burning
8.description: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

9.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
9.description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

10.name: Bull Durham
10.description: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

11.name: They Live
11.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

12.name: Rain Man
12.description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

13.name: Akira
13.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

14.name: Earth Girls Are Easy
14.description: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

15.name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
15.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

16.name: Police Academy 5: Assignment: Miami Beach
16.description: The Police Academy's commandant will be honored at a police convention in Miami Beach. At the airport he picks a wrong bag with stolen diamonds. The "owners" want them back.

17.name: Dangerous Liaisons
17.description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

18.name: The Last Temptation of Christ
18.description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

19.name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
19.description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

20.name: Working Girl
20.description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

21.name: Rambo III
21.description: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

22.name: Child's Play
22.description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

23.name: Oliver & Company
23.description: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

24.name: Running on Empty
24.description: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live a life of his own.

25.name: The Accused
25.description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

26.name: Bloodsport
26.description: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

27.name: Midnight Run
27.description: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

28.name: Cocktail
28.description: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

29.name: Twins
29.description: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

30.name: The Land Before Time
30.description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

31.name: A Fish Called Wanda
31.description: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

32.name: Young Guns
32.description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

33.name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
33.description: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

34.name: Big Business
34.description: Two couples of sisters from New York and from the countryside discover that they are connected in an incredible way.

35.name: Mystic Pizza
35.description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

36.name: Beaches
36.description: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

37.name: The Blob
37.description: A deadly entity from space crashes near a small town and starts to consume anyone in its path. Panic ensues, as shady government scientists try to contain the horrific creature.

38.name: Hairspray
38.description: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

39.name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
39.description: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

40.name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
40.description: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

41.name: 'Crocodile' Dundee II
41.description: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

42.name: The Dark Side of the Sun
42.description: Traveling in search of a cure for a rare skin disease, a man finds freedom and love along the way.

43.name: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
43.description: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

44.name: Mujeres al borde de un ataque de "nervios"
44.description: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

45.name: License to Drive
45.description: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

46.name: Le grand bleu
46.description: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

47.name: Sleepaway Camp II: Unhappy Campers
47.description: Angela, supposedly reformed and living under an assumed surname, is working at a summer camp. However, when the campers start misbehaving, she soon reverts to her old ways.

48.name: Two Moon Junction
48.description: A young Southern débutante temporarily abandons her posh lifestyle and upcoming, semi-arranged marriage to have a lustful and erotic fling with a rugged drifter who works at a local carnival.

49.name: Frantic
49.description: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

50.name: Mac and Me
50.description: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.
